items.sentence: Tom has been bitten by Mary\'s dog many times.
Tom didn\'t get along with the other students.

Tom didn\'t have a good excuse for not coming.
Tom didn\'t have any reason not to trust Mary.
Should I tell Tom what you and I did together?

Those who were there thought it was pure gold.
I think Tom will ask Mary to do that for John.
I think you should write Tom a thank you note.
Isn\'t it strange that Tom isn\'t here by now?
The teacher asked Tom to read his essay aloud.
I\'ve never told this story to anybody before.
If I can\'t trust my parents, who can I trust?
Tom excels both academically and athletically.

I\'ll never be able to do that as well as you.
